issue.title: [CF 1008] FPS drops every time I attack
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Whenever I try to attack my fps drops dramatically, this only happens with one character specifically. (Human DK)
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect to have no fps drop when I enter combat but instead my fps drops to about 8 and the screen starts to tear.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

Version 7.1.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?

comments.body:
Im sorry if Im missing something this is the first time Im posting an issue here so if you guys need additional information let me know.

Thanks
